screen_name: Many may know that O- is the universal blood donor, but did you know that AB+ is the universal plasma donor? I didn't know my blood type until I donated, but now that I know that I am a universal plasma donor and that I was COVID-19 positive, I am more in need now than ever... https://t.co/qUF4Lw9Mpm

Donated a liter of my love to help fight against COVID-19 and will continue to donate until this is over. Hearing that you’re positive is one of the scariest moments of your life. Hearing that you survived and have the opportunity to help others is a reward in itself. https://t.co/WPp9nH9cJs

If you have tested positive, recovered and fall under the criteria to donate, then please visit https://t.co/dm13UJgsFr to find out more information and to see if you qualify to donate your convalescent plasma. Together, we can and will get through this! ❤️❤️❤️.

If you have tested positive, recovered and fall under the criteria to donate, then please visit https://t.co/dm13UJgsFr to find out more information and to see if you qualify to donate your convalescent plasma. Together, we can and will get through this! ❤️❤️❤️.
The amount of characters can not fully express what I need to say. To those who have tested positive and recovered, please check out https://t.co/4PC0DaFAjS https://t.co/jx9Jg0agP1

5 weeks ago, I was a statistic. I tested positive for COVID-19. I was scared. Scared at how the disease can escalate but more so scared of infecting my loved ones at home. Thankful and blessed it was mild and only lasted for a week. Now I am given the opportunity to give back ❤️. https://t.co/LODTGLsOko
